2. Oribe Texturizing Spray: This hair serum is formulated with sea salt and other texturizing ingredients to help add volume and texture to your hair, while also helping to enhance your natural waves and curls.
3. Moroccanoil Beach Wave Mousse: This hair mousse is formulated with sea salt and other texturizing ingredients to help add volume and texture to your hair, while also helping to enhance your natural waves and curls.
